kv17.4:5.3: Indriyabaddhaññeva aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?
kv17.4:5.6: nanu anindriyabaddhaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti?
kv17.4:5.8: Hañci anindriyabaddhaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.4:8.3: Nanu yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā—
kv17.4:8.6: Hañci yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā—
kv17.4:8.7: “anindriyabaddhaṃ aniccaṃ”, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.4:9.4: Yathā indriyabaddhassa dukkhassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati, evamevaṃ anindriyabaddhassa dukkhassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatīti?
kv17.4:9.7: yathā indriyabaddhaṃ dukkhaṃ pariññātaṃ na puna uppajjati, evamevaṃ anindriyabaddhaṃ dukkhaṃ pariññātaṃ na puna uppajjatīti?
